unlocks.message:
Gems are personalized by your experiences.
Here are 5 possibilities.
unlocks.heading: LISTENED FOR 1,000 MINUTES
unlocks.title: Streaming PRODUCT unlocks a new element for your Gem

unlocks.message: Real-world interactions are also possible, like discovering hidden objects.
unlocks.heading: FOUND HIDDEN OBJECT
unlocks.title: The secret code on a pool toy at Honest Jon's unlocks a rare element

unlocks.message: Gems are full of easter eggs. Visiting storied locations with friends might unlock a new element.
unlocks.heading: FOUND SPECIAL LOCATION
unlocks.title: Visiting Heaven's alley with friends unlocks a surprise element for each of you

unlocks.message: Fans can also work together on community listening.
unlocks.heading: 1 MILLION COMMUNITY STREAMS
unlocks.title: Fans who owned the Gem before this milestone unlock a limited element

unlocks.message:
Piece by piece, a Gem becomes
increasingly personal to its collector.
unlocks.heading: SECRET ELEMENT UNLOCKED
unlocks.title: Unlocking multiple elements might reveal a secret bonus

unlocks.message: Your Gem reflects your experiences with the album.
